nodes.text: A star in the Outer Rim Territories was orbited by the planet Shadda-Bi-Boran. In 39 BBY, the star began to die, prompting the evacuation of Shadda-Bi-Boran's population by a relief group that included Padmé Naberrie and her father Ruwee of Naboo, as well as Onaconda Farr. However, the evacuees had been dependent on nutrients from their sun that they could not get anywhere else, resulting in their deaths when Shadda-Bi-Boran's environment could not be properly replicated.
